General.Name: KBC Ancora
General.Description: KBC Ancora SCA holds participating interest in KBC Group SA. The company was formerly known as Almancora SCA and changed its name to KBC Ancora SCA in June 2007. KBC Ancora SCA was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Leuven, Belgium. KBC Ancora SCA is a subsidiary of Cera SC.

0.Name: Mr. Franky Cera Depickere
0.Title: MD & Exec. Director of Almancora Société De Gestion SA

1.Name: Ms. Katelijn  Callewaert
1.Title: MD & Director of Almancora Societe De Gestion SA
